Mission.Description:
We've been contracted to investigate the fate of a trade vessel.
Find out what happened.

The client doesn't care about the cargo. Grab whatever you can.
We've been contracted to retrieve a certain valuable item from an abandoned vessel.\nAnything else you find is a for us to keep.
